lead_paragraph: David Möller of Germany won the singles title at the luge world championships yesterday in Igls, Austria, edging the defending champion Armin Zoeggeler of Italy by 0.007 of a second.
snippet: David Möller of Germany won the singles title at the luge world championships yesterday in Igls, Austria, edging the defending champion Armin Zoeggeler of Italy by 0.007 of a second.
